name: 3D VIRTUALMAZE
description:
An immersive interactive THREE DIMENSIONAL VIRTUAL REALITY action game... straight out of the early 90's. Like, the really early 90's.

Your home planet is under an ancient curse which is killing the populace, and the only thing that can bring peace is to retrieve the mystical MAGIC LANTERN from the far-off planet ELDERON XVII. However, the ancient tribe of strange creatures that protect this lantern is known to not take kindly to visitors...

A maze-based FPS with an authentic raycasted* DOS game aesthetic. Beware, fans of level intricate geometry, this isn't the game you're looking for!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

ESC - Pause

E, Space or Right Click - Open

Left Click or CTRL - Fire

*it's not actually rendered via old-school raycasting. i just made sure it really looked like it was.
